widgets.title: VPCs
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniques(displayName) AS '' FROM PrivateNetworkSample WHERE provider = 'Vpc' SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: VPC Count by Region
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(displayName) AS '' from PrivateNetworkSample WHERE provider = 'Vpc' FACET awsRegion since 1 week ago

widgets.title: All CIDR blocks in use
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniques(ipV4Address) AS '' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT 500

widgets.title: Kubernetes Clusters
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniques(clusterName) AS '' FROM NetworkSample SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Number of Instances Reporting Data
widgets.nrql: SELECT uniquecount(ec2InstanceId) FROM ComputeSample SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Traffic by VPC
widgets.nrql: SELECT  sum(`provider.bytes`) / 1024 / 1024 from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface' TIMESERIES auto since 1 day ago facet `provider.vpcId`

widgets.title: AWS Service Requests
widgets.nrql: SELECT SUM(requestCount), sum(throttleException) FROM IntegrationProviderReport FACET awsRegion, awsServiceName SINCE 1 week ago LIMIT MAX

widgets.title: Traffic by Subnet
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.bytes`) / 1024 / 1024 from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface' TIMESERIES auto since 1 day ago facet `provider.subnetId`

widgets.title: Accepted/Rejected Traffic
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.bytes`) / 1024 / 1024 from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface' TIMESERIES auto since 1 day ago facet `provider.action`

widgets.title: Rejected Traffic by Source IP
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.packets`) from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface'  and `provider.action` = 'REJECT' TIMESERIES auto since 1 day ago facet `provider.sourceAddress`

widgets.title: Traffic by Requestor ID
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.bytes`) / 1024 / 1024 from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface' TIMESERIES auto since 1 day ago facet `provider.requesterId`

widgets.title: Traffic by EC2 Instance
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.bytes`) / 1024 / 1024 from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface' facet `provider.privateDnsName` since 1 day ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Top Rejected IPs
widgets.nrql: SELECT sum(`provider.packets`) from PrivateNetworkSample where provider='VpcNetworkInterface' and `provider.action` = 'REJECT' since 1 hour ago facet `provider.sourceAddress`
